page.title: 20my nan
page.content:
For breakfast she usually has muesly and an apple . In her spair time nan usually knits. My nan does a lot for me and my two sisters, she buyes us toys, clothes and sweets she baby sits when mum and dad go out in the evening. In the holidays she takes us for days out. When we go on holidays she looks after our house for us and waters the plants. Most of the children in the village have their grandpartents living near them, and they are on important part of community and family life.
Emma Wellings aged 11
